column2: "The Tranmizer is incredible! Shape-shifting Mech are cool! I think I'm in love with that thing!"
"But it's no toy! It's crazy powerful, dude! I need to know the best way to take it down!"
"Taking that one on is a huge risk. It's not only powerful, it's crazy fast to boot. I bet even you couldn't handle it."
"But I know whatever I say won't stop you. I'm learning, yeah?"
"All I can really do is cheer you on from here, so go give 'em hell. I can't wait to hear your report!"
